width="32" height="35" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="R7w8rheLYaE1ZwkQsRlZ-8" value="<font color="#323232"><span style="font-size: 18px;"><b>Start stop and monitor</b></span><b style="color: rgb(50, 50, 50); font-size: 18px;">:</b></font><div><font color="#323232"><span style="font-size: 18px;"><b><br></b></span></font><div><div>sudo systemctl start validator.service</div><div>sudo systemctl stop validator.service</div><div>sudo systemctl restart validator.service</div><div><br></div><div><br></div><div>Once started check the status with</div><div>agave-validator --ledger ~/ledger monitor</div><div>and</div><div>solana catchup --our-localhost --keypair ~/wallets/validator-identity.json</div><div><br></div><div>Tail logs for warning with</div><div>grep --extended-regexp 'ERROR|WARN' ~/log/validator.log</div></div><div><br></div></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontFamily=Helvetica;fontSize=11;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=top;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="694" y="595" width="363" height="227" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="wk3zBTeRZD1_7GcEYwBj-1" value="<div style="line-height: 110%;"><h2 style="margin-top: 2px;"><font color="#323232"><span style="font-weight: bold; line-height: 110%;"><font style="font-size: 17px;">Firewal - NFTTABLES</font></span></font></h2><div><font><h3 style="font-size: 12px; line-height: 110%;"></h3><h3>Setup script to remove ufw and iptables:</h3><pre>#!/bin/bash<br>set -e&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; # Exit on errors<br>set -x&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; # Print commands on screen<br># Disable ufw<br>sudo ufw disable || true<br>sudo ufw --force reset<br># Set policy: Accept all traffic (avoids ssh lockout)<br>sudo iptables --policy INPUT ACCEPT<br>sudo iptables --policy FORWARD ACCEPT<br>sudo iptables --policy OUTPUT ACCEPT<br># Flush all rules<br>sudo iptables --flush<br># Delete all chains<br>sudo iptables --delete-chain<br># Reset all counters<br>sudo iptables --zero<br># Flush and delete nat, mangle and raw tables<br>sudo iptables --table nat --flush<br>sudo iptables --table nat --delete-chain<br>sudo iptables --table mangle --flush<br>sudo iptables --table mangle --delete-chain<br>sudo iptables --table raw --flush<br>sudo iptables --table raw --delete-chain</pre><h3>Configuration</h3><div>/etc/nftables.conf<pre>#!/usr/sbin/nft -f<br>flush ruleset<br>table inet filter {<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; chain input {<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; type filter hook input priority filter; policy drop;</pre><pre><br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; ct state established accept<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; udp dport 8000-10000 accept<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; ct state related accept<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; ct state invalid drop<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; iif lo accept<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; tcp dport 8000 accept</pre><pre><br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; # Allow Solana RPC packets requests from these IPs<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; tcp dport 8899 ip saddr {<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 77.200.151.32<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; } accept</pre><pre><br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; # Allow Prometheus Solana exporter metrics access from these IPs<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; tcp dport 9100 ip saddr {<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 77.200.151.32<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; } accept<br><br></pre><pre><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span># Allow Node exporter for Prometheus (hardware info)<br> tcp dport 9110 ip saddr {<br> 77.200.151.32 # Your home server IP<br> } accept</pre><pre><br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; tcp dport ssh ct state new limit rate 12/minute accept<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; ip protocol icmp icmp type echo-request limit rate 5/second accept<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; log prefix "[nftables] DROP: "<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; }<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; chain output {<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; type filter hook output priority filter; policy accept;<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; }<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; chain forward {<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; type filter hook forward priority filter; policy drop;<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; }<br>}</pre><pre><br></pre></div><p>To reload after changes:<br>sudo nft -f /etc/nftables.conf</p></font></div></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontFamily=Helvetica;fontSize=11;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=top;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1089" y="51" width="470" height="1002" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="wk3zBTeRZD1_7GcEYwBj-2" value="SSH configuration:

Config:/etc/ssh/sshd_config.d/99-hardened.conf


# Host keys
HostKey /etc/ssh/ssh_host_ed25519_key
HostKey /etc/ssh/ssh_host_rsa_key
# Access control
PermitRootLogin no
AllowGroups sshusers
StrictModes yes
# Authentication
PasswordAuthentication no
PubkeyAuthentication yes
AuthorizedKeysFile .ssh/authorized_keys
ChallengeResponseAuthentication no
# Session control
X11Forwarding no
ClientAliveInterval 100
PerSourceMaxStartups 1
# Cryptographic Hardening
KexAlgorithms sntrup761x25519-sha512@openssh.com,curve25519-sha256,curve25519-sha256@libssh.org,gss-curve25519-sha256-,diffie-hellman-group16-sha512,gss-group16-sha512-,diffie-hellman-group18-sha512,diffie-hellman-group-exchange-sha256
Ciphers aes256-gcm@openssh.com,aes256-ctr,aes192-ctr,aes128-gcm@openssh.com,aes128-ctr
MACs hmac-sha2-256-etm@openssh.com,hmac-sha2-512-etm@openssh.com,umac-128-etm@openssh.com
HostKeyAlgorithms sk-ssh-ed25519-cert-v01@openssh.com,ssh-ed25519-cert-v01@openssh.com,rsa-sha2-512-cert-v01@openssh.com,rsa-sha2-256-cert-v01@openssh.com,sk-ssh-ed25519@openssh.com,ssh-ed25519,rsa-sha2-512,rsa-sha2-256
CASignatureAlgorithms sk-ssh-ed25519@openssh.com,ssh-ed25519,rsa-sha2-512,rsa-sha2-256
GSSAPIKexAlgorithms gss-curve25519-sha256-,gss-group16-sha512-
HostbasedAcceptedAlgorithms sk-ssh-ed25519-cert-v01@openssh.com,ssh-ed25519-cert-v01@openssh.com,sk-ssh-ed25519@openssh.com,ssh-ed25519,rsa-sha2-512-cert-v01@openssh.com,rsa-sha2-512,rsa-sha2-256-cert-v01@openssh.com,rsa-sha2-256
PubkeyAcceptedAlgorithms sk-ssh-ed25519-cert-v01@openssh.com,ssh-ed25519-cert-v01@openssh.com,sk-ssh-ed25519@openssh.com,ssh-ed25519,rsa-sha2-512-cert-v01@openssh.com,rsa-sha2-512,rsa-sha2-256-cert-v01@openssh.com,rsa-sha2-256

14px;">From:&nbsp;https://github.com/anza-xyz/agave</font></font></h2><div><font><h3 style="font-size: 12px; line-height: 110%;"></h3><h3>Config:</h3><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); font-weight: normal;">&nbsp;</span>/home/sol/.config/solana/cli/config.yml<br><br>Content:<br><pre>Config File: /home/sol/.config/solana/cli/config.yml<br>RPC URL: https://api.testnet.solana.com<br>WebSocket URL: wss://api.testnet.solana.com/ (computed)<br>Keypair Path: /home/sol/wallets/validator-identity.json<br>Commitment: confirmed</pre><h3><span style="font-size: 12px; line-height: 110%;">Service:&nbsp;</span></h3><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); font-size: 12px; font-weight: normal; line-height: 110%;">validator.service</span><div><span style="background-color: transparent; line-height: 110%;"><div style=""><span style="font-size: 12px;">/etc/systemd/system/solana-validator.service</span></div><div style=""><span style="font-size: 12px;"><br></span></div><div style=""><span style="font-size: 12px;">Content:</span></div></span></div><pre><span style="font-size: 12px; font-weight: 400; line-height: 110%;">[Unit]<br></span><span style="font-size: 12px; font-weight: 400; line-height: 110%;">Description=Solana Validator<br></span><span style="font-size: 12px; font-weight: 400; line-height: 110%;">After=network.target network-online.target<br></span><span style="font-size: 12px; font-weight: 400; line-height: 110%;">Wants=network-online.target<br></span><span style="font-size: 12px; font-weight: 400; line-height: 110%;">StartLimitIntervalSec=0</span><span style="font-size: 12px; font-weight: 400;"><br></span><span style="font-size: 12px; font-weight: 400; line-height: 110%;">[Service]<br></span><span y="195.72727272727263" width="32" height="35" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="amhKxIcj7umPnLfnaLqu-12" value="<div style="line-height: 110%;"><h2 style="margin-top: 2px;"><font color="#323232"><span style="font-weight: bold; line-height: 110%;"><font style="font-size: 17px;">Firewal - NFTTABLES</font></span></font></h2><div><font><h3 style="font-size: 12px; line-height: 110%;"></h3><h3>Setup script to remove ufw and iptables:</h3><pre>#!/bin/bash<br>set -e&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; # Exit on errors<br>set -x&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; # Print commands on screen<br># Disable ufw<br>sudo ufw disable || true<br>sudo ufw --force reset<br># Set policy: Accept all traffic (avoids ssh lockout)<br>sudo iptables --policy INPUT ACCEPT<br>sudo iptables --policy FORWARD ACCEPT<br>sudo iptables --policy OUTPUT ACCEPT<br># Flush all rules<br>sudo iptables --flush<br># Delete all chains<br>sudo iptables --delete-chain<br># Reset all counters<br>sudo iptables --zero<br># Flush and delete nat, mangle and raw tables<br>sudo iptables --table nat --flush<br>sudo iptables --table nat --delete-chain<br>sudo iptables --table mangle --flush<br>sudo iptables --table mangle --delete-chain<br>sudo iptables --table raw --flush<br>sudo iptables --table raw --delete-chain</pre><h3>Configuration</h3><div>/etc/nftables.conf<pre>#!/usr/sbin/nft -f<br>flush ruleset<br>table inet filter {<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; chain input {<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; type filter hook input priority filter; policy drop;</pre><pre><br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; ct state established accept<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; udp dport 8000-10000 accept<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; ct state related accept<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; ct state invalid drop<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; iif lo accept<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; tcp dport 8000 accept</pre><pre><br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; # Allow Solana RPC packets requests from these IPs<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; tcp dport 8899 ip saddr {<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 77.200.151.32<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; } accept</pre><pre><br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; # Allow Prometheus exporter metrics access from these IPs<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; tcp dport 9100 ip saddr {<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 77.200.151.32<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; } accept</pre><pre><br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; tcp dport ssh ct state new limit rate 12/minute accept<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; ip protocol icmp icmp type echo-request limit rate 5/second accept<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; log prefix "[nftables] DROP: "<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; }<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; chain output {<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; type filter hook output priority filter; policy accept;<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; }<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; chain forward {<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; type filter hook forward priority filter; policy drop;<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; }<br>}</pre></div><div><br></div></font></div></div>" Config:/etc/ssh/sshd_config.d/99-hardened.conf


# Host keys
HostKey /etc/ssh/ssh_host_ed25519_key
HostKey /etc/ssh/ssh_host_rsa_key
# Access control
PermitRootLogin no
AllowGroups sshusers
StrictModes yes
# Authentication
PasswordAuthentication no
PubkeyAuthentication yes
AuthorizedKeysFile .ssh/authorized_keys
ChallengeResponseAuthentication no
# Session control
X11Forwarding no
ClientAliveInterval 100
PerSourceMaxStartups 1
# Cryptographic Hardening
KexAlgorithms sntrup761x25519-sha512@openssh.com,curve25519-sha256,curve25519-sha256@libssh.org,gss-curve25519-sha256-,diffie-hellman-group16-sha512,gss-group16-sha512-,diffie-hellman-group18-sha512,diffie-hellman-group-exchange-sha256
Ciphers aes256-gcm@openssh.com,aes256-ctr,aes192-ctr,aes128-gcm@openssh.com,aes128-ctr
MACs hmac-sha2-256-etm@openssh.com,hmac-sha2-512-etm@openssh.com,umac-128-etm@openssh.com
HostKeyAlgorithms sk-ssh-ed25519-cert-v01@openssh.com,ssh-ed25519-cert-v01@openssh.com,rsa-sha2-512-cert-v01@openssh.com,rsa-sha2-256-cert-v01@openssh.com,sk-ssh-ed25519@openssh.com,ssh-ed25519,rsa-sha2-512,rsa-sha2-256
CASignatureAlgorithms sk-ssh-ed25519@openssh.com,ssh-ed25519,rsa-sha2-512,rsa-sha2-256
GSSAPIKexAlgorithms gss-curve25519-sha256-,gss-group16-sha512-
HostbasedAcceptedAlgorithms sk-ssh-ed25519-cert-v01@openssh.com,ssh-ed25519-cert-v01@openssh.com,sk-ssh-ed25519@openssh.com,ssh-ed25519,rsa-sha2-512-cert-v01@openssh.com,rsa-sha2-512,rsa-sha2-256-cert-v01@openssh.com,rsa-sha2-256
